channel.title: Dedicated Hosting
channel.description:
Hey,
As you may know from my recruitement-topic (sig) I'm busy making a new server. Im planning on getting dedicated hosting for this server in a week or 2. Ofcourse I'll also need a .com website, webclient, votesystem, MySQL for donators, etc.
But, I've never owned a dedicated server before. So do you guys know a good company to host it, or the best way to do it?
Thanks in advance!

item.title: Dedicated Hosting
item.dc:creator: @Coelho Coelho
item.description:
@Coelho wrote:

www.kimsufi.co.uk/

Get an i7 processor and 24 gigs of ram for ~$80/m. They take quite a bit to activate your server, but the prices are worth it, and once it is activated it never goes down (In my experience).

Read full topic

item.title: Dedicated Hosting
item.dc:creator: @mrduck mrduck
item.description:
@mrduck wrote:

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:8, topic:411565”]How?

They take forever to activate the VPS
They have too many problems
their not fast
since when are they 24/7?

I’ve had so many problems with them, and others will agree, their shit.[/quote]

Yea, im waiting on that as we speak… I think im going to cancel the whole thing if it takes any longer…

Read full topic

item.title: Dedicated Hosting
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

The first time it was 32 hours, second time: 7 minutes.

What kind of problems?

Yes, the speed is one thing, but the 20mbps down/up is enough for my server at least.

They have been 24 / 7 with me for two months, with the exception of one bumpy/laggy hour. Don’t know why it won’t work for you guys

Read full topic

item.title: Dedicated Hosting
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

ExtremeX-Scape™:

VPSland sucks, use host gator, 1and1.com.

How did they suck? I love Vpsland. Their networks are 24 7 and fast. The customer support actually answers my tickets within a day. And it’s hella cheap too.

Just wondering,
Whac

Read full topic

item.title: Dedicated Hosting
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

1-2gb ram, it’s cheaper, but don’t get too much.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

Is it expensive like hell? Honestly VPSLand has never failed me in any way, Idk why there are so many negative reviews. If I were you I would get a VPS.
